Description: This Sunny 2nd floor is totally renovated. 2 modern bathrooms ( with designer tile showers), modern kitchen w/ Stainless steel appliances ( D/W & disp, 36" double door fridge, microwave & Gas stove) and Granite counters, There is also a Hi Efficiency Washer & dryer in the apartment. There sizes of the Bedrooms are approximately : 11'x16' / 8.5'x12' / 16'x11' / 9'x10' & 12'x13'. There is No Separate Living room in this apartment but there is room for a couch in the Large kitchen and there is wiring for a wall mounted flat screen TV.
